topic: Some argue that private vehicles should be banned from city centers, while others believe personal transportation freedom is essential. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
essayText:
Some say no car in city other say need car. I talk about both.

No car good because air clean. Too many car make pollution. People sick from bad air. Also no traffic jam save time. Can walk easy no danger from car.

But car important for people. Old people need car cannot walk far. Mother with baby need car for shopping. No car how go hospital emergency? Shop need delivery truck bring thing to sell.

I think no ban all car. Maybe some car ok but not all. Need good bus first.

So both side have point. Car bad for air but people need for life. Must find middle way.
strengths: Shows basic understanding of the topic
weaknesses: Major grammatical errors in every sentence
